24 abstract class ScaffoldController {
25  protected $config;
26  public static $views = [
27  "CRUD" => [ "index" => "@framework/crud/index.html","form" => "@framework/crud/form.html","display" => "@framework/crud/display.html" ],
28  "auth" => [ "index" => "@framework/auth/index.html","info" => "@framework/auth/info.html","noAccess" => "@framework/auth/noAccess.html","disconnected" => "@framework/auth/disconnected.html","message" => "@framework/auth/message.html","baseTemplate" => "@framework/auth/baseTemplate.html" ] ];

38  protected abstract function storeControllerNameInSession($controller);

40  public abstract function showSimpleMessage($content, $type, $title = null, $icon = "info", $timeout = NULL, $staticName = null);
41 
42  protected abstract function _addMessageForRouteCreation($path, $jsCallback = "");
43 
44  public function _createMethod($access, $name, $parameters = "", $return = "", $content = "", $comment = "") {
45  $templateDir = $this->getTemplateDir ();
46  $keyAndValues = [ "%access%" => $access,"%name%" => $name,"%parameters%" => $parameters,"%content%" => $content,"%comment%" => $comment,"%return%" => $return ];
47  return UFileSystem::openReplaceInTemplateFile ( $templateDir . "method.tpl", $keyAndValues );
48  }
49 
50  public function _createController($controllerName, $variables = [], $ctrlTemplate = 'controller.tpl', $hasView = false, $jsCallback = "") {
51  $message = "";
52  $templateDir = $this->getTemplateDir ();
53  $controllersNS = \rtrim ( Startup::getNS ( "controllers" ), "\\" );
54  $controllersDir = \ROOT . \DS . str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $controllersNS );
55  $controllerName = \ucfirst ( $controllerName );
56  $filename = $controllersDir . \DS . $controllerName . ".php";
57  if (\file_exists ( $filename ) === false) {
58  $namespace = "";
59  if ($controllersNS !== "") {
60  $namespace = "namespace " . $controllersNS . ";";
61  }
62  $msgView = "";
63  $indexContent = "";
64  if ($hasView) {
65  $viewDir = \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $controllerName . \DS;
66  UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( $viewDir );
67  $viewName = $viewDir . \DS . "index.html";
68  UFileSystem::openReplaceWriteFromTemplateFile ( $templateDir . "view.tpl", $viewName, [ "%controllerName%" => $controllerName,"%actionName%" => "index" ] );
69  $msgView = "<br>The default view associated has been created in <b>" . UFileSystem::cleanPathname ( \ROOT . \DS . $viewDir ) . "</b>";
70  $indexContent = "\$this->loadView(\"" . $controllerName . "/index.html\");";
71  }
72  $variables = \array_merge ( $variables, [ "%controllerName%" => $controllerName,"%indexContent%" => $indexContent,"%namespace%" => $namespace ] );
73  UFileSystem::openReplaceWriteFromTemplateFile ( $templateDir . $ctrlTemplate, $filename, $variables );
74  $msgContent = "The <b>" . $controllerName . "</b> controller has been created in <b>" . UFileSystem::cleanFilePathname ( $filename ) . "</b>." . $msgView;
75  if (isset ( $variables ["%path%"] ) && $variables ["%path%"] !== "") {
76  $msgContent .= $this->_addMessageForRouteCreation ( $variables ["%path%"], $jsCallback );
77  }
78  $this->storeControllerNameInSession ( $controllersNS . "\\" . $controllerName );
79  $message = $this->showSimpleMessage ( $msgContent, "success", null, "checkmark circle", NULL, "msgGlobal" );
80  } else {
81  $message = $this->showSimpleMessage ( "The file <b>" . $filename . "</b> already exists.<br>Can not create the <b>" . $controllerName . "</b> controller!", "warning", null, "warning circle", 100000, "msgGlobal" );
82  }
83  return $message;
84  }
85 
86  public function addCrudController($crudControllerName, $resource, $crudDatas = null, $crudViewer = null, $crudEvents = null, $crudViews = null, $routePath = '') {
87  $crudController = new CrudControllerCreator ( $crudControllerName, $resource, $crudDatas, $crudViewer, $crudEvents, $crudViews, $routePath );
88  $crudController->create ( $this );
89  }
90 
91  public function addAuthController($authControllerName, $baseClass, $authViews = null, $routePath = "") {
92  $authCreator = new AuthControllerCreator ( $authControllerName, $baseClass, $authViews, $routePath );
93  $authCreator->create ( $this );
94  }
95 
96  public function addRestController($restControllerName, $baseClass, $resource, $routePath = "", $reInit = true) {
97  $restCreator = new RestControllerCreator ( $restControllerName, $baseClass, $resource, $routePath );
98  $restCreator->create ( $this, $reInit );
99  }
100 
101  public function _createClass($template, $classname, $namespace, $uses, $extendsOrImplements, $classContent) {
102  $namespaceVar = "";
103  if (UString::isNotNull ( $namespace )) {
104  $namespaceVar = "namespace {$namespace};";
105  }
106  $variables = [ "%classname%" => $classname,"%namespace%" => $namespaceVar,"%uses%" => $uses,"%extendsOrImplements%" => $extendsOrImplements,"%classContent%" => $classContent ];
107  $templateDir = $this->getTemplateDir ();
108  $directory = UFileSystem::getDirFromNamespace ( $namespace );
109  UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( $directory );
110  $filename = UFileSystem::cleanFilePathname ( $directory . \DS . $classname . ".php" );
111  if (! file_exists ( $filename )) {
112  UFileSystem::openReplaceWriteFromTemplateFile ( $templateDir . $template, $filename, $variables );
113  $message = $this->showSimpleMessage ( "The <b>" . $classname . "</b> class has been created in <b>" . $filename . "</b>.", "success", "Creation", "checkmark circle" );
114  } else {
115  $message = $this->showSimpleMessage ( "The file <b>" . $filename . "</b> already exists.<br>Can not create the <b>" . $classname . "</b> class!", "warning", "Creation", "warning circle" );
116  }
117  return $message;
118  }
119 
120  public function _newAction($controller, $action, $parameters = null, $content = '', $routeInfo = null, $createView = false, $theme = null) {
121  $templateDir = $this->getTemplateDir ();
122  $msgContent = "";
123  $r = new \ReflectionClass ( $controller );
124  if (! method_exists ( $controller, $action )) {
125  $ctrlFilename = $r->getFileName ();
126  $content = CodeUtils::indent ( $content, 2 );
127  $classCode = UIntrospection::getClassCode ( $controller );
128  if ($classCode !== false) {
129  $fileContent = \implode ( "", $classCode );
130  $fileContent = \trim ( $fileContent );
131  $posLast = \strrpos ( $fileContent, "}" );
132  if ($posLast !== false) {
133  if ($createView) {
134  $viewname = $this->_createViewOp ( ClassUtils::getClassSimpleName ( $controller ), $action, $theme );
135  $content .= "\n\t\t\$this->loadView('" . $viewname . "');\n";
136  $msgContent .= "<br>Created view : <b>" . $viewname . "</b>";
137  }
138  $routeAnnotation = "";
139  if (is_array ( $routeInfo )) {
140  $name = "route";
141  $path = $routeInfo ["path"];
142  $routeProperties = [ '"' . $path . '"' ];
143  $methods = $routeInfo ["methods"];
144  if (UString::isNotNull ( $methods )) {
145  $routeProperties [] = '"methods"=>' . $this->getMethods ( $methods );
146  }
147  if (isset ( $routeInfo ["ck-Cache"] )) {
148  $routeProperties [] = '"cache"=>true';
149  if (isset ( $routeInfo ["duration"] )) {
150  $duration = $routeInfo ["duration"];
151  if (\ctype_digit ( $duration )) {
152  $routeProperties [] = '"duration"=>' . $duration;
153  }
154  }
155  }
156  $routeProperties = \implode ( ",", $routeProperties );
157  $routeAnnotation = UFileSystem::openReplaceInTemplateFile ( $templateDir . "annotation.tpl", [ "%name%" => $name,"%properties%" => $routeProperties ] );
158 
159  $msgContent .= $this->_addMessageForRouteCreation ( $path );
160  }
161  $parameters = CodeUtils::cleanParameters ( $parameters );
162  $actionContent = UFileSystem::openReplaceInTemplateFile ( $templateDir . "action.tpl", [ "%route%" => "\n" . $routeAnnotation ?? '',"%actionName%" => $action,"%parameters%" => $parameters,"%content%" => $content ] );
163  $fileContent = \substr_replace ( $fileContent, "\n%content%", $posLast - 1, 0 );
164  if (! CodeUtils::isValidCode ( '<?php ' . $content )) {
165  echo $this->showSimpleMessage ( "Errors parsing action content!", "warning", "Creation", "warning circle", null, "msgControllers" );
166  return;
167  } else {
168  if (UFileSystem::replaceWriteFromContent ( $fileContent . "\n", $ctrlFilename, [ '%content%' => $actionContent ] )) {
169  $msgContent = "The action <b>{$action}</b> is created in controller <b>{$controller}</b>" . $msgContent;
170  echo $this->showSimpleMessage ( $msgContent, "success", "Creation", "info circle", null, "msgControllers" );
171  }
172  }
173  }
174  } else {
175  echo $this->showSimpleMessage ( "The action {$action} already exists in {$controller}!", "error", "Creation", "warning circle", null, "msgControllers" );
176  }
177  }
178  }
179 
180  protected function getMethods($strMethods) {
181  $methods = \explode ( ",", $strMethods );
182  $result = [ ];
183  foreach ( $methods as $method ) {
184  $result [] = '"' . $method . '"';
185  }
186  return "[" . \implode ( ",", $result ) . "]";
187  }
188 
189  protected function _createViewOp($controller, $action, $theme = null) {
190  $prefix = "";
191  if (! isset ( $theme ) || $theme == '') {
192  $theme = $this->config ["templateEngineOptions"] ["activeTheme"] ?? null;
193  }
194  if ($theme != null) {
195  $prefix = 'themes/' . $theme . '/';
196  }
197  $viewName = $prefix . $controller . "/" . $action . ".html";
198  UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $prefix . $controller );
199  $templateDir = $this->getTemplateDir ();
200  UFileSystem::openReplaceWriteFromTemplateFile ( $templateDir . "view.tpl", \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $viewName, [ "%controllerName%" => $controller,"%actionName%" => $action ] );
201  return $viewName;
202  }
203 
204  public function createAuthCrudView($frameworkName, $controllerName, $newName) {
205  $folder = \ROOT . \DS . "views" . \DS . $controllerName;
206  UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( $folder );
207  try {
208  $teInstance = Startup::getTempateEngineInstance ();
209  if (isset ( $teInstance )) {
210  $blocks = $teInstance->getBlockNames ( $frameworkName );
211  if (sizeof ( $blocks ) > 0) {
212  $content = [ "{% extends \"" . $frameworkName . "\" %}\n" ];
213  foreach ( $blocks as $blockname ) {
214  $content [] = "{% block " . $blockname . " %}\n\t{{ parent() }}\n{% endblock %}\n";
215  }
216  } else {
217  $content = [ $teInstance->getCode ( $frameworkName ) ];
218  }
219  }
220  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
221  $content = [ $teInstance->getCode ( $frameworkName ) ];
222  }
223  if (isset ( $content )) {
224  return UFileSystem::save ( $folder . \DS . $newName . ".html", implode ( "", $content ) );
225  }
226  }
227 
228  public function setConfig($config) {
229  $this->config = $config;
230  }
231 }
